  • Boostrap paginator plugin
  • JQuery
  • JQuery-UI
  • Unify Bootstrap theme

Contains all

  • Formatters (for all contents of the module com.alkacon.bootstrap.schemas)
  • Templates
  • Template resources
  • Dynamic functions
  • Localization for formatters

Description.content: Contains the GWT generated resources for the integrated search.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The content of the demo website. This module has no module folder - it only contains the contents under /sites/default/ (except the documentation/ subfolder). The content module also adds some users that have the new roles added in OpenCms 9.5.
